channel.title: Help with Script Idea
channel.description: I have two computers at my house and I normally mine on one while doing bank runs on the other. Was wondering if it's possible to have it auto mine then wait for a trade when it's full. trade the ore and start all over? If so please help.

item.title: Help with Script Idea
item.dc:creator: @Akuma Akuma
item.description:
@Akuma wrote:

Yep.

You would need 2 custom made scripts to do that. Its a very good idea.
I might make some.

Read full topic
